hits.definition:
临 (F 臨)

[lín] overlook, be adjacent to; 临时 temporary

吴 (F 吳)

[Wú] <family name>, Wu Kingdom (222-280 A.D.)

摇 (F 搖)

[yáo] shake

跳

[tiào] jump; 跳伞 tiàosǎn parachute; 跳舞 tiàowǔ dance

曲

[qū] (= 弯曲 wānqū) curved

[qǔ] melody

练 (F 練)

[liàn] white silk, (=练习 liànxí) practice

构 (F 構)

[gòu] 结构 jiégòu structure; 构成 constitute; 构造

玩

[wán] play; 玩具 wánjù toy; 好玩儿 hǎowánr fun

犯

[fàn] violate; 犯罪 fànzuì commit a crime; 罪犯 criminal

厂 (F 廠)

[chǎng] (=工厂 gōngchǎng) factory

肯

[kěn] be willing to, consent; 肯定 kěndìng definitely

协 (F 協)

[xié] 协作 xiézuò cooperate

幸

[xìng] good fortune, luck; 幸福 xìngfú happy

挥 (F 揮)

[huī] wave, wield; command an army; 挥手 wave (one's hand)

效

[xiào] (=效果 xiàoguǒ) effect, result; 有效 yǒuxiào effective

齐 (F 齊)

[qí] 整齐 zhěngqí neat; 一齐 yìqí together

[zhāi] (=斋)

[zī] (=粢)

封

[fēng] to seal; 封建 feudal; 信封 envelope

温 (F 溫)

[wēn] (=温暖 wēnnuǎn) warm; 温度 wēndù temperature
